--- xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:

> Unicron:
> 
> "Then, Scourge if you need rest and reparation, go ahead"
> And looking to Vorpal said "You have my permission to investigate 
> Predacons activities, but always keep an eye in the main enemy the 
> maximal. Remember to neutralize the ex-matrix bearer"

Scourge nodded as he stood and left the room, he had other things to
do, one of which was to rest and await a chance to send the Cybertrons
to the pit. He smiled slightly as his imagination ran away with him, a
he unconsiously stroked his arm, where Cyclonus had gripped it. 

Vorpal nodded as he too stood, but he went to one of the control panels
as he began to redirect his sensors along the surface of the planet,
especially near to where Maximals and the Predicons had bases. 

A surprised look appeared on his face, "Interesting." his voice was low
and crafty. "Cyclonus, have our soldiers go and investigate these
co-ordinates." Vorpal pointed to the viewscreen as a map of the earth
appeared and then zeroed in a a specific local. "For some reason we are
detecting weapons fire. It could be a battle." Vorpral chuckled,
"Perhaps you were wrong after all, maybe the Predicons are doing
something about the Maximals."

Cyclonus nodded, as he opened a comm channel, "Deepstryke."

"Yes commander." Came the ready reply.

"Change in plan, you have a new mission."

......

Preston
(Da'minion)
